member.name: T:Discord.Addons.SimplePermissions.PermissionAttribute
member.summary: Sets the minimum permission level of this command or all commands in this module. Requires the module to be whitelisted for any level.
member.remarks: This precondition is always succesful outside of Guild contexts. Remember to apply to restrict where commands may be invoked if needed.

member.name: M:Discord.Addons.SimplePermissions.PermissionAttribute.#ctor(Discord.Addons.SimplePermissions.MinimumPermission)
member.summary: Sets the permission level of this command.

member.name: T:Discord.Addons.SimplePermissions.MinimumPermission
member.summary: Determines what a command's minimum permission requirement should be.

member.name: F:Discord.Addons.SimplePermissions.MinimumPermission.Everyone
member.summary: Everyone can use this command.

member.name: F:Discord.Addons.SimplePermissions.MinimumPermission.ModRole
member.summary: People in the mod role or higher can use this command.

member.name: F:Discord.Addons.SimplePermissions.MinimumPermission.AdminRole
member.summary: People in the admin role or higher can use this command.

member.name: F:Discord.Addons.SimplePermissions.MinimumPermission.GuildOwner
member.summary: The guild owner can use this command.

member.name: F:Discord.Addons.SimplePermissions.MinimumPermission.Special
member.summary: Someone is specially allowed to use this command.

member.name: F:Discord.Addons.SimplePermissions.MinimumPermission.BotOwner
member.summary: Only the bot owner can use this command.
